name: Aurelia in Oslo
description: Next week, Rob Eisenberg will be presenting at the Norwegian Developers Conference [http://www.ndcoslo.com/] in Oslo, Norway. He'll be giving two presentations. The first, The New JavaScript: ES6 [http://ndcoslo.oktaset.com/t-30202], is designed to bring you up to speed on the latest developments in JavaScript and help you catch a vision of where the language is heading in the future. The second talk, Aurelia: Next Generation Web Apps [http://ndcoslo.oktaset.com/t-30201], will show you how a modern, ES6-based framework can make building complex JavaScript clients effortless. If you are in or around Oslo, we hope you will come and check it out.
content:
Next week, Rob Eisenberg will be presenting at the [Norwegian Developers Conference](http://www.ndcoslo.com/) in Oslo, Norway. He'll be giving two presentations. The first, [The New JavaScript: ES6](http://ndcoslo.oktaset.com/t-30202), is designed to bring you up to speed on the latest developments in JavaScript and help you catch a vision of where the language is heading in the future. The second talk, [Aurelia: Next Generation Web Apps](http://ndcoslo.oktaset.com/t-30201), will show you how a modern, ES6-based framework can make building complex JavaScript clients effortless. If you are in or around Oslo, we hope you will come and check it out.

Also, Core Team Member, [K. Scott Allen](http://odetocode.com/), will be introducing Aurelia to the [AngularJS Oslo Meetup](http://www.meetup.com/AngularJS-Oslo/) on Tuesday evening. If you aren't able to attend NDC, then you also have this unique opportunity to [hear from a great teacher like Scott about Aurelia](http://www.meetup.com/AngularJS-Oslo/events/221899417/).
